product_name: ExOfficio ExO Dri Lattice Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's ExO Dri Lattice(TM) Tank Top from ExOfficio is a performance shirt with a stylish look, and features dri-release(R) technology to keep you cool, dry, and fresh. Highly breathable dri-release polyester/cotton/spandex fabric dries 4 times faster than all-cotton fabric. Fabric also wicks moisture, stretches and offers UPF 15 sun protection. Great for travel, the ExO Dri Lattice Tank Top also resists wrinkles and odor. Closeout.
short_description: The women's ExO Dri Lattice(TM) Tank Top from ExOfficio is a performance shirt with a stylish look, and features dri-release(R) technology to keep you cool, dry, and fresh.
